title: Typing skills: position and keystroke
creator_credit: Don B. Klugman, Creative Establishment and Coronet Films
brief_description: Janet Wilner’s company selected her for a time-mtion study and discovered that good typing starts with a typist’s position at the typewriter and with the way she manages her keystroke. Extensive slow-motion photography reveals the basic elements of good typing.
creator_credit_for_label: Don B. Klugman, Creative Establishment and Coronet Films
